name: Xaviersobased
description:
'''Xavier Lopez''' (born October 23, 2003), known professionally as '''Xaviersobased''' (stylized in [[Letter case|lowercase]]), is an American [[rapper]] and [[record producer]] known for his eccentric rapping and production style. 

He has been credited, alongside his collective 1c34 and Californian producer kashpaint, as pioneering the Internet [[microgenre]], "[[Jerk (music genre)|jerk]]", while his discography spans a number of other genres including [[Trap music|trap]], [[Plugg music|plugg]] and [[digicore]].
